member.name: M:MathAssignment.MathQues.CompareTo(MathAssignment.MathQues)
member.summary: This is a public compareTo method from the IComparable interface. This compares the answer of (this) object with that of the input otherMathObj answer This returns 3 values 0 if both answers are the same -1 if 'This' object is numerically less than the otherMathObj answer 1 if 'This' object is numerically greater than the otherMathObj answer
